node.name: Brlouk eclipse modeling tools
node.shortdescription:
BEM provides a complete environment domain model tool for Software Architecture to define DSL’s and reuse models.

BEM allows you to design your domain model in easiest way with re-use of registered models. You can create multi view parts of your domain model in order to help you to mange complexity.
Using the Semantic Visual Validator, you can check graphically your model and avoid mistakes.

To take advantage of Java framework and code generation that EMF provides, BEM helps you to reuse every Java model Element existed in you project.
The refactoring feature added in version 0.8 allows you to modify your model without affecting the diagram behavior.

Finally, BEM supports generic types and provides all you need to use generics and then generate good quality code.
node.body:
BEM provides a complete environment domain model tool for Software Architecture to define DSL’s and reuse models.

BEM allows you to design your domain model in easiest way with re-use of registered models. You can create multi view parts of your domain model in order to help you to mange complexity.
Using the Semantic Visual Validator, you can check graphically your model and avoid mistakes.

To take advantage of Java framework and code generation that EMF provides, BEM helps you to reuse every Java model Element existed in you project.
The refactoring feature added in version 0.8 allows you to modify your model without affecting the diagram behavior.

Finally, BEM supports generic types and provides all you need to use generics and then generate good quality code.
